collections_text:
## New Year, New Leadership!

**Happy New Year from Yeiser Art Center!**

We’re excited to kick off 2026 with gratitude and big news. First, a heartfelt thank you to **Denny Roof** for his steadfast leadership as Interim Director last year. We deeply appreciate his dedication and are thrilled to welcome him back to the Board as **Treasurer**.

We’re also delighted to announce that **Chuck Benya** has joined Yeiser Art Center as **Managing Director** , effective January 1. Chuck brings more than 25 years of visionary leadership in the arts and humanities, and we can’t wait for you to learn more about his plans for our future.

[**Meet Chuck**](/meet-our-team)

[ Donate 2026 ](/donate)

## Thank You for Making 2025 a Year to Remember!

As we reflect on this past year, we are filled with gratitude for the incredible support that made 2025 such a success. Your generosity—through contributions, volunteer time, and in-kind gifts—has strengthened Yeiser Arts Center’s mission to inspire creativity and connect our community through the arts.

Because of you, we were able to present engaging exhibitions, host educational programs, and create spaces where art and community thrive. Every donation, every hour volunteered, and every resource shared has made a meaningful impa...
